title: At least 36 dead as fire engulfs Hong Kong tower blocks
summary: Firefighters are struggling to put out the flames and say they are unsure when the blaze will be fully contained.
impact_summary: Firefighters are struggling to put out the flames and say they are unsure when the blaze will be fully contained.

title: What we know about the Hong Kong apartment fires
summary: The death toll continues to rise and hundreds are missing, as firefighters struggle to put out the fire.
impact_summary: The death toll continues to rise and hundreds are missing, as firefighters struggle to put out the fire.

title: 'I am devastated': Hong Kong residents in disbelief after fire destroys blocks of flats
summary: Efforts to control the blaze are continuing as locals wait for news of missing loved ones.
impact_summary: Efforts to control the blaze are continuing as locals wait for news of missing loved ones.

title: Trump defends Witkoff after leak appears to show envoy coaching Russia
summary: The US president said he had not heard the audio, but that it sounded like "standard" negotiations.
impact_summary: The US president said he had not heard the audio, but that it sounded like "standard" negotiations.

title: Where peace stands in Ukraine after frantic diplomacy
summary: The Trump administration seems serious about reaching a deal despite all the apparent chaos around its efforts.
impact_summary: The Trump administration seems serious about reaching a deal despite all the apparent chaos around its efforts.

title: Georgia judge dismisses 2020 election interference case against Trump
summary: The state charges were the last remaining criminal case against the US president stemming from the 2020 election.
impact_summary: The state charges were the last remaining criminal case against the US president stemming from the 2020 election.

title: Soldiers seize power in Guinea-Bissau and detain the president
summary: The military takeover comes as the West African nation was awaiting the results of Sunday's election.
impact_summary: The military takeover comes as the West African nation was awaiting the results of Sunday's election.

title: Nicolas Sarkozy illegal campaign financing conviction upheld
summary: The former French president will have to serve a six-month term with an electronic bracelet, plus another six months suspended.
impact_summary: The former French president will have to serve a six-month term with an electronic bracelet, plus another six months suspended.

title: Teens launch High Court challenge to Australia's social media ban
summary: They argue the law - which will block users under 16 from having social media accounts - is unconstitutional.
impact_summary: They argue the law - which will block users under 16 from having social media accounts - is unconstitutional.

title: Chicago man accused of setting train passenger on fire had 72 prior arrests
summary: The victim was reading her phone while riding on a train when the man allegedly doused her with gasoline.
impact_summary: The victim was reading her phone while riding on a train when the man allegedly doused her with gasoline.

title: 'Once in 300 years' rain hits Thai city as floods ravage South East Asia
summary: The deadly floods have affected 2 million people, the majority of whom are still cut off from help.
impact_summary: The deadly floods have affected 2 million people, the majority of whom are still cut off from help.

title: Italian parliament unanimously votes to make femicide a crime
summary: The gender-motivated murder of a woman will now be covered by a distinct clause in Italian law - punishable by a life sentence.
impact_summary: The gender-motivated murder of a woman will now be covered by a distinct clause in Italian law - punishable by a life sentence.

title: New Zealand woman gets life sentence for 'suitcase murders' of her children
summary: Hakyung Lee killed her two kids and hid their bodies in suitcases months after her husband died of cancer.
impact_summary: Hakyung Lee killed her two kids and hid their bodies in suitcases months after her husband died of cancer.

title: Twenty-four Nigerian schoolgirls released over a week after abduction
summary: Nigerian officials dispute reports that some 250 children remain missing after another mass school kidnap.
impact_summary: Nigerian officials dispute reports that some 250 children remain missing after another mass school kidnap.

title: Israel confirms Hamas and PIJ returned body of Gaza hostage Dror Or
summary: The handover means the bodies of two deceased hostages are still being held in Gaza six weeks after the ceasefire began.
impact_summary: The handover means the bodies of two deceased hostages are still being held in Gaza six weeks after the ceasefire began.
